title: CoMapeo Icons Generator
description: This tool can be used to generate icons for use in CoMapeo, or any other tool. Currently, the tool generates icons in an SVG format ready to be used in a CoMapeo configuration.
config: To learn more about integrating these icons in a CoMapeo configuration, see the documentation here:
enter-search: Enter one or more words to search for icons
name: name
error: we couldn't find any icons associated with that phrase
empty-search-error: Please enter at least one word to search for icons
loadingMoreError: that's all the icons we could find for that phrase
save-images: Click the below icons to download them. If download doesn't happen automatically, right-click or touch and hold to save the SVGs.
